name: Technyra [Nextjs]
blurb: 1.5 day build (including QA) using Claude Code and Figma's MCP server. Features custom email API with Cloudflare Turnstile protection, Framer Motion and GSAP animations.
keyFeatures: Next.js 15, Tailwind CSS, Figma, MCP, Cloudflare
Custom email API with Cloudflare Turnstile protection
